title: RegulatoryPurposeCode
description: Regulatory purpose code reference entity supporting 350+ purpose codes across 69 jurisdictions

purposeCodeId.description: UUID v4 primary key - Non-ISO Extension

jurisdiction.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (CN, IN, BR, KR, etc.) - ISO 20022 Compliant

codeValue.description: Jurisdiction-specific purpose code value (e.g., 121010 for China, S0001 for India, 10101 for Brazil) - Non-ISO Extension

codeDescription.description: Purpose code description (e.g., General merchandise trade - export) - ISO 20022 Compliant

category.description: High-level category: Trade in Goods, Trade in Services, Income, Current Transfers, Capital Account, Financial Account, etc. - ISO 20022 Extended

subCategory.description: Sub-category: Export, Import, Processing Trade, General Merchandise, Software, Professional Services, etc. - ISO 20022 Extended

iso20022Mapping.description: ISO 20022 External Purpose Code equivalent (GDDS, SVCS, SALA, DIVI, LOAN, etc.) - ISO 20022 Compliant

applicablePaymentTypes.description: Payment types where code applies - Non-ISO Extension

requiresSupportingDocuments.description: Documentation requirements flag (true if trade documents, invoices, contracts required) - Non-ISO Extension

effectiveTo.description: Effective end date (NULL = currently active) - Non-ISO Extension
